page.title: 20Doomsday 1986
page.content: When William the Norman First came to our land, {His army held missiles and { Launched them by hand. } Defeat for his army, King Harold lay slain. {The people were frightened {Of torture and pain. "True peace for the future," The new king predicts. {"Let a new age begin now in 1066." But years in between Have seen sorrow and tears; {Man now has the bomb {For the bows and the spears. Were Duke William's army To march here today,{ {A touch of a button would blow it away This light in the heaven's A nuclear bomb. {What hope for the future? {Will peace ever come?
